Description: Portrait of Mary Countess of Thanet aged four; half length to left; oval in frame, in centre of a composition of the Repose in Egypt, engraved in outline; proof before letter. Stipple on chine collé
Curator's comments: Cataloguing supported by the Pilgrim Trust
Bibliographic references: O'Donoghue 1908-25 / Catalogue of Engraved British Portraits preserved in the Department of Prints and Drawings in the British Museum (1)
Associated names: Portrait of: Margaret, Countess of Thanet
